definition: edge of the water/waterside/shore (of sea, lake or river)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海島水邊飯店位於達沃的南部，離國際機場2公里。

sentences.english: Gongjue living buddha has accompanied them to waterside.
sentences.chinese: 貢覺活佛一直把他們送到水邊。

sentences.english: One such stand popped up by our water garden.
sentences.chinese: 有一羣這樣的馬利筋竟然侵入了我們的水邊花園。

sentences.english: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures; he leadeth me beside the still waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我躺臥在青草地上，領我至可安歇的水邊。

sentences.english: The man of whom I think , Is on the margin of the water .
sentences.chinese: 我思念的心上伊人啊，正在泱泱水邊上。

sentences.english: Blessed are ye that sow beside all waters, that send forth thither the feet of the ox and the ass.
sentences.chinese: 你們在各水邊撒種牧放牛驢的有福了。

sentences.english: A common feature of Chinese garden is the waterside pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 水邊臺榭是中國園林常見的特點之一。

sentences.english: Next stop is Shui Pin Wai, Zone 5 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系水邊圍，屬單程車票第五收費區。

sentences.english: Nure-onna is typically seen at the water's edge, washing her long, flowing hair.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常會在水邊看見濡女清洗她長而柔順的頭髮。

sentences.english: The outdoor water's edge's sightseeing platform and open-air bakes the area to be possible to hold about 60 people.
sentences.chinese: 室外水邊的觀光平臺和露天燒烤區可容納六十人左右。

sentences.english: They walked down to the water’s edgeto look for him and found him floating in the shallows.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿着水邊尋找他，最終發現他飄在水面上。

sentences.english: Next stop is Shui Pin Wai. The end of Zone 5 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系水邊圍，單程車票第五收費區終止。

sentences.english: The hut by the side of the water is shaded by an overhanging tree.
sentences.chinese: 水邊的茅屋被懸於頭頂的大樹廕庇着。

sentences.english: The Nine-color Deer came upon a river and saved Diao Da who was drowning.
sentences.chinese: 九色鹿王途經水邊，救出溺水者調達。

sentences.english: My root was spread out by the waters, and the dew lay all night upon my branch.
sentences.chinese: 我的根長到水邊，露水終夜沾在我的枝上。

sentences.english: Nure-onna is typically seen at the water’s edge, washing her long, flowing hair.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常會在水邊看見濡女清洗她長而柔順的頭髮。
